name: Ollie The Gun
description:
A 2D Shoot-Out with Unique Bullets!


You befriended a talking gun that has the ability to use ordinary items he finds as bullets. You go together on an adventure through the Shroom Dungeon.

Can you find all the different bullets and defeat the King of the Shrrom dungeon?

We tried our best to make a game that fits the theme and would be fun to play!

  • 7 Unique bullet mechanics
  • 16 unique dungeon rooms
  • Versatile enemies
  • Boss fight
  • Quirky gun

The MetaFab API in this game is used for:

  • Player account creation and management
  • Saving data
  • Minting a trophy item when you defeat the boss

Every asset in the game, except for the font (BitPap), was made within the period of 3 weeks, for the purpose of this game jam.

Mala Vidra - Programming, SFX

nsbs27 - Art assets, SFX

KalishaStonks - Music, SFX

This game was made for the purpose of MetaFab GameJam
